name: Break of Reality
description: '''Break of Reality''' (BoR) is an American cello rock band consisting of three cellists and a percussionist.  The group is associated with the terms "cinematic rock", "[[cello rock]]", and "indie classical". Break of Reality's current members are Patrick Laird, Ivan Trevino, Laura Metcalf, and Adrian Daurov. The band's sound consists of many musical influences, such as [[rock music|rock]], [[Classical music|classical]], and [[indie rock]].
